Audio Description: This poster features two illustrations of the same red-lipped, dark haired, dark eyed young woman as a cadet nurse on a white background. The figure in left foreground is wearing a gray beret with a silver insignia of an eagle perched on a shield with stars and stripes. She is wearing a gray military uniform jacket with a white blouse buttoned at the collar. There are red epaulettes on both shoulders. In the right background she is wearing a white nursing cap and a white dress. On the left sleeves of both images is the cadet nurse insignia that has a white cross in a red circle. Below the images of the young woman are the words in red letters: “Cadet Nurse: The Girl with a Future.” In a gray strip below that are the words “A lifetime education free for high school graduate who qualify.” There is a dark box in the left of the gray strip with white letters that reads: “For information, go to your local hospital or write U.S. Cadet Nurse Corps, Box 88, New York 8, N.Y.”
Creator: United States. Public Health Service
Description: Poster, 71 x 51 cm, artist: Jon Whitcomb
